scripts.install-all: npm install && cd @trycourier/courier-js && npm install && cd ../courier-ui-core && npm install
scripts.build-all: npm run build-courier-js && npm run build-courier-ui-core && npm run build-courier-ui-inbox
scripts.watch-all: concurrently "npm run watch-courier-js" "npm run watch-courier-ui-core" "npm run watch-courier-ui-inbox"
scripts.run-vanilla-app: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run watch-all" "cd examples/vanilla-app && npm run start"
